Text: No, Ive been looking for it. Its on my M.I.A. list. Will up as soon as it exists though.
Hey, Downtown looking for Batgirls first run and 2nd Run. And Robin and Red Robin any suggestions? Thanks you da bomb.

Thanks for the re-direct on the Red Robin my friend. There seems to be nobody seeding the Batgirl...ugh. Alas, and is there a way to get Robin Specials and initial run 1-183 without such a bulk download, curious if at all possible. Thanks heartily again my friend.

Check both Batgirl torrents - I got mine from Joshua13's torrent (second on listed) - If you're using VUZE you can stop torrent, click arrow to left to open and view contents, then select the files you do not want, right click >set priority>delete. Then Queue torrent again and it will ONLY download the rest. I usually do not upload files that are so big because I have shit for internet and would be super-seeding forever. It will take awhile just because there are a lot of files. I think v1 is around 100 issues - just set it before bed and let it download while you sleep. Also if you are using another torrent program just google how to select which files to download within a torrent
Well that makes alot of sense my friend. I just figured I would find solid files, as opposed to mix and matching but it seems that is the best bet. Thanks for all the help.
